nodes.text:
(alias) function hashAuthorization<to extends To = "hex">(parameters: HashAuthorizationParameters<to>): HashAuthorizationReturnType<to>
import hashAuthorization
nodes.docs: Computes an Authorization hash in [EIP-7702 format](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7702): `keccak256('0x05' || rlp([chain_id, address, nonce]))`.
Computes an Authorization hash in [EIP-7702 format](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7702): `keccak256('0x05' || rlp([chain_id, address, nonce]))`.
Address of the contract to delegate to.
Nonce of the EOA to delegate to.
